#summary What one needs to get started using the code

= Getting Started =

To make use of the code, the user will need to download `chebtran.py` from the [http://www.scientificpython.net/1/post/2012/05/fast-chebyshev-transforms-revisited.html Scientific Python Blog] into the folder containing the trunk of the code.

Run python main.py --help to see what parameters are available.

Example scripts for running the code and for submitting several runs to be performed in parallel can be found in the `scripts` directory.
